bioghist.p: John McAllister, Sr. (1753-1830) was a manufacturer of whips and canes, a spectacles maker, and mathematics instructor in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. His only son was John McAllister, Jr. (1786-1877).

scopecontent.p: This volume records the personal accounts of John McAllister, Sr. and John McAllister, Jr. The entries document purchases of wood, flour, cigars, pork, a coffee mill, and a chair with wheels, and payments of taxes and the hire of carriages.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
